name: Tea Gift Voucher
description: Voucher issued by NLCH, used to redeem delicious tea snacks
But… where’s NLCH’s shop anyway?
ability: Can be fed to gacha machine without damage to trigger a pull
Always gives an 11-pull with at least one gold ball

name: Adventurer’s Handbook
subtitle: "Written by RORO, begun on 2024/10/1"
description: It began as a casual journal by an adventurer named RORO
Over time, more people who found it fun joined and added notes
and thus this curious guidebook—covering everything from
‘How to Enter the Dungeon’ to ‘What to Eat for Dinner’—was born
ability: Lets you browse the in-game guide

name: Junk
description: Various scraps, useless
Why did I even pick this up?

name: 10 Yen
description: Just a coin worth 10 Yen
But… it can’t buy anything at all!

name: 50 Yen
description: Just a coin worth 50 Yen
Still seems like it buys nothing… but losing it would still hurt

name: 100 Yen
description: Just a coin worth 100 Yen
With a bit of luck, it might be enough to buy
\str[120]’s favorite strawberry milk

name: 500 Yen
description: Just a coin worth 500 Yen
If it goes into the gacha… maybe—just maybe—
it’ll hit a legendary Item pull…!

name: 1000 Yen
description: Just a 1000 Yen banknote
No one knows why even monsters have started
collecting human money…

name: 5000Yen
description: Just a 5000 Yen banknote
Anyone who sees it can’t help but feel moved—
is this the power of money…?

name: 10000 Yen
description: Just a 10000 Yen banknote
Even a gacha machine would smile at such value—

name: 50000 Yen
description: A thick stack of 5000 Yen banknotes
As the maid Bunnys rapidly expand trade
monsters have also begun snatching adventurers’ wallets
just to experience this thing called 'shopping'

name: 100000 Yen
description: A thick stack of 10000 Yen banknotes
Its scent of wealth can even make
greedy demons smile seductively—

name: Bunny Map
description: A map used by maid bunnies, still covered in carrot crumbs
They dig Rabbit Holes and zip around—almost like a delivery crew
Since that devilish, sharp-minded leader appeared ten years ago
the bunnies took over the Abyss and started trading with monsters
ability: Allows you to view the Abyss map and all interactive objects

name: Magic Camera
description: Said to be an Eastern artifact, exquisitely crafted yet lost
in the Abyss... It freezes scenes into images, but it’s
easily affected by magic, sometimes capturing strange things
ability: Press F7 to take a photo

name: Sister's Ahoge
description: An ahoge pulled from my sister's head,
but she doesn't seem to notice...This ahoge still stubbornly
stands up and has a strangely resilient spring to it

name: Philosopher's Fragment
subtitle: "Haec est totius fortitudinis fortitudo fortis,
quia vincet omnem rem subtilem, omnemque solidam penetrabit."
description: Even just a fragment contains immense power—

name: Delicious Milk
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: HP+120、gained the Delicious!! status

name: Carrot Milk
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: HP+75、randomly remove 1 status ailment

name: Strawberry Milk
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: HP+75、Attack+50% for a while

name: Melon Milk
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: HP+75、Magic Attack+50% for a while

name: Banana Milk
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: HP+75、Speed up for a while

name: Pink Konpeito
subtitle: "Fufufu... Better not to know the ingredients~♥"
description: Delicately crafted konpeitō handmade by the Archdemon
Gives off a peach-like aroma that makes you dizzy just smelling it…
ability: Makes your whole body feel hot after eating!

name: Blue Konpeito
subtitle: "Fufufu... Better not to know the ingredients~♥"
description: Delicately crafted konpeitō handmade by the Archdemon
Gives off a blueberry-like aroma that brings calm just smelling it…
ability: Brings a sense of calm after eating...

name: Green Konpeito
subtitle: "Fufufu... Better not to know the ingredients~♥"
description: Delicately crafted konpeitō handmade by the Archdemon
Gives off a melon-like aroma that lifts you up just smelling it…
ability: Effect not implemented

name: Springy Mizumanju
subtitle: "Fufufu... Better not to know the ingredients~♥"
description: Handcrafted by an Archdemon, bouncy, refreshing Mizumanju
Hits like a shock the moment it touches your tongue!
ability: Effect not implemented

name: NLCH's Cola(L)
subtitle: "Sponsored by:NLCH"
description: A drink from a strange vending machine
Never mind the taste, why is there a vending machine?
ability: Violent shaking may trigger a powerful explosion

name: Kenaz
subtitle: "Power of Explosion"
description: A stone engraved with magic runes, designed so even novices with
no knowledge of magic can easily activate its effect
ability: Throws and turns the target it touches into a bomb
Detonates in 5s, with larger targets causing a wider blast

name: Ansuz
subtitle: "Power of Revelation"
description: A stone engraved with magic runes, designed so even novices with
no knowledge of magic can easily activate its effect
ability: Leaves a text-marked sign at the location when used
After updating, the sign becomes visible to other players

name: Raido
subtitle: "Power of Riding"
description: A stone engraved with magic runes, designed so even novices with
no knowledge of magic can easily activate its effect
ability: Throws a marker that allows position swapping

name: Ehwaz
subtitle: "Power of Change"
description: A stone engraved with magic runes, designed so even novices with
no knowledge of magic can easily activate its effect
ability: Throws and swaps positions with the target it touches

name: The Fool
subtitle: "The endless curiosity of a foolish adventurer"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: used forcibly teleports you to a random map

name: The High Priestess
subtitle: "May you receive her favor..."
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, summons a gate leading to the Fallen Church

name: The Emperor
subtitle: "The dragon's majesty, inviolable"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: Used Dragon's Roar to stuns all enemies on screen

name: The Lovers
subtitle: "The Witch’s Lingering Scent"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, summons monsters and drives them berserk briefly

name: Chariot
subtitle: "At your service! Hell Express!"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, a NLCH truck slams into the player

name: Strength
subtitle: "Unleash the power of the Giant God Soldier"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: Melee weapons temporarily enlarge&Attack up

name: The Wheel of Fortune
subtitle: "Soul-Gambling Roulette"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, Grants a random buff or debuff

name: Justice
subtitle: "Ashes to ashes, dust to dust"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, removes all statuses from the player

name: Death
subtitle: "The goal of all life is death"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, the Death Devil’s power manifests here

name: Temperance
subtitle: "Pandora's Box of the Abyss"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: When used, summons a gacha machine

name: The Star
subtitle: "The star is the guiding beacon home"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: Summons a Star Door near the player to return to start

name: The Sun
subtitle: "Rebirth from the ashes"
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: Grants the Blessing of the Firebird upon use

name: The World
subtitle: "Invites you to the mysterious miniature garden world..."
description: A magic card imbued with spells. Designed so
even novices can easily activate its effects
ability: Resets the countdown for drop-related events upon use

name: Jack Bomb
subtitle: "Look over here...!"
description: An alchemical bomb infused with frenzied fire elements
Due to its highly unstable nature, it will detonate immediately
just by holding it
It’ll explode instantly in hot environments!

name: Frost Jack Bomb
subtitle: "Look over here...!"
description: An alchemical bomb infused with frigid ice elements
Due to its highly unstable nature, it will detonate immediately
just by holding it

name: Venom Jack Bomb
subtitle: "Look over here...!"
description: An alchemical bomb infused with lethal poison
Due to its highly unstable nature, it will detonate immediately
just by holding it

name: Sealed Timepiece
description: A special magical artifact inscribed with a sealing spell
When shattered, it activates its effect, causing everything
within a certain range—including time itself—to come to a halt

name: Ginkela
description: A strange feed of unknown origin, said to taste surprisingly good
Its aroma lures not only animals but even monsters!
Handle with care—the scent fades quickly if not stored well
ability: When thrown, it creates a scent cloud that draws in monsters

name: Sushi Pudding
description: A familiar of a certain Archdemon. Letting it loose
will lead you to the Archdemon’s whereabouts. But
is it a Neko, sushi, or pudding? It still looks delicious

name: Bird Leg Meat
description: Thigh meat harvested from various birds
The meat is tender and plump,
making it perfect for meat dishes

name: Large Beast Meat
description: Fresh meat carved from a monster. Delicious meat dishes can
be made from it. Monsters eat people, and people eat monsters
This is the natural order

name: Small Beast Meat
description: Fresh meat carved from a monster. Delicious meat dishes can
be made from it. Monsters eat people, and people eat monsters
This is the natural order

name: WaterWeird Mucus
description: Mucus secreted by a WaterWeird, commonly used as a general
ingredient in alchemy
It is sometimes also used as a lubricant

name: Walking Mushrooms
description: A mushroom from Walking Mushroom, now immobile
When sliced, it looks just like a regular mushroom

name: Slime Mucus
description: Mucus secreted by a slime, commonly used as a general
ingredient in alchemy
It is sometimes also used as a lubricant

name: Apple
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Curry Block
description: A spicy curry block made from exotic spices
Pairs well with rice and can be added to various ingredients

name: White Rice
description: Simple yet comforting white rice
Can be eaten plain or combined with various ingredients

name: Carrot
description: A common vegetable, but it's strange to find it in the abyss
Needs proper preparation before eating

name: Potato
description: A common vegetable, but it's strange to find it in the abyss
Needs proper preparation before eating

name: Red Chili Pepper
description: A common vegetable, but it's strange to find it in the abyss
Needs proper preparation before eating

name: Tomato
description: A common vegetable, but it's strange to find it in the abyss
Needs proper preparation before eating

name: Banana
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Strawberry
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Grape
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Pineapple
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Watermelon
description: Freshly picked fruit, full of refreshing flavor
Eating it directly slightly restores health

name: Spaghetti
description: Springy, elastic noodles that go well with any dish
Delicious with just a bit of sauce

name: Tomato Sauce
description: Made from tomatoes, with a tangy and sweet flavor
It's best not to think about why monster would drop this

name: Wheat Flour
description: Flour made from ground wheat, useful for various dishes

name: Oyster Mushroom
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: Shiitake
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: Beech Mushroom
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: Lilac Mushroom
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: Moonlight Mushroom
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: Bamboo Mushroom
description: A common mushroom often seen outside
However, finding it in the abyss is quite unusual

name: ASABA's Strawberry
subtitle: "Mmm… strawberries… my strawberries…"
description: ASABA’s most treasured, high-quality strawberry that it can’t bear
to eat. But even after desperately guarding it until the very end
it still ends up as nothing more than a trophy—

name: Octopus tentacles
description: Broken octopus tentacles fished from the sea, they smell great when grilled
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Sea Bream
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Tuna
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Striped Beakfish
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Grouper
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Pacific Saury
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Sweet shrimp
description: Freshly caught shrimp from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Spiny lobster
description: Freshly caught lobster from the sea, be careful not to get pinched
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Hairy crab
description: Freshly caught crab from the sea, be careful not to get pinched
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Salmon
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: King Salmon
description: Freshly caught from the sea, perfect for sashimi
It can also be cooked with other ingredients

name: Beast Meat
description: Meat taken from a monster. It can be used to make delicious dishes
Monsters eat humans, and humans eat monsters—it's only natural

name: A Large Egg
description: A huge egg from the abyss. What creature is it from?
I didn't think too much—an egg is an egg

name: Banana fairy
description: What on earth is this?

name: Apple fairy
description: What on earth is this?

name: Old Videotape
description: A special medium that stores footage from a bygone era, playable
only with specific equipment. Some propose it was an alchemical
product of an ancient civilization, though no proof exists
Its scarcity also makes collectors highly eager to obtain it

name: Horror Videotape
description: A special medium that stores footage from a bygone era, playable
only with specific equipment. Some propose it was an alchemical
product of an ancient civilization, though no proof exists
It also seems cursed—the footage is always unnervingly chilling

name: Adult Videotape
description: A special medium that stores footage from a bygone era, playable
only with specific equipment. Some propose it was an alchemical
product of an ancient civilization, though no proof exists
It seems to be restricted content, filled with arousing scenes

name: Yuri Doujinshi
subtitle: "Onee-chan... I feel like... I can’t live without you anymore..."
description: A doujinshi with beautiful art.
But it depicts a forbidden love between two beautiful girls...
Story’s so steamy, even the pages give off a faint pink scent.
ability: Increases desire after reading!

name: Moe Doujinshi
subtitle: "Moe moe kyun~♡"
description: A doujinshi filled with pink bubbles and heart-shaped effects.
Characters blush and get flustered over the tiniest things...
They say you might end up sighing "so moe~" after reading it.
ability: Increases desire after reading!

name: Catgirl Doujinshi
subtitle: "Master... nya~ Can I get some headpats?"
description: A doujinshi that smells faintly of catnip.
Shows catgirls purring, rolling, and wagging their tails.
May make you consider getting a talking nyan-wife...
ability: Increases desire after reading!

name: Elixir Rubrum
subtitle: "Haec est totius fortitudinis fortitudo fortis,
quia vincet omnem rem subtilem, omnemque solidam penetrabit."
description: The reddened Philosopher's Fragment flows like blood
Its proper use is still unknown, but for now,
just try drinking it like a beverage…

name: \str[120]'s Free Pass
subtitle: "There are lots of doodles and scribbles all over the pass..."
description: A handmade Free Pass drawn by \str[120]. \str[121] may seek
\str[120]'s affection — no matter how selfish the request, it’s granted
Even so, \str[120] has always wanted to do something nice for
\str[121], with or without the pass—

name: NLCH's polaroid#1
subtitle: "What are you doing, staring over here like that…!"
description: Photos capturing the daily lives of the girls
the tea party, but… who took these pictures?

name: NLCH's polaroid#2
subtitle: "this is just how rabbits show affection~"
description: Photos capturing the daily lives of the girls
the tea party, but… who took these pictures?

name: Polaroid Collection Album
subtitle: "Soft and adorable girls♥ I wanna take every one of them home—!"
description: A photo album specially made for collecting cute girl snapshots.
Opening it releases a faint scent of black tea...
ability: Polaroids Collected: \c[6]${QJ.MPMZ.tl.checkPolaroidCount()}\c[0]/35

name: Polaroid Collection Album
subtitle: "Soft and adorable girls♥ I wanna take every one of them home—!"
description: A photo album specially made for collecting cute girl snapshots.
Opening it releases a faint scent of black tea...
ability: Complete collection! Luck permanently increased!

name: Blue Radiant Stone
description: A blue gemstone with a captivating glow
While lacking practical value, someone might pay a high price for it…
or have other intentions?

name: Small Mana Gel
description: A jelly-like substance formed purely from condensed mana
It’s edible, but its taste varies greatly with one’s magical aptitude
Its main use is as a consumable material for magic

name: Red Rhomboid Stone
description: A red gemstone with a captivating glow
While lacking practical value, someone might pay a high price for it…
or have other intentions?
